trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed"></xref> and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed"> </xref> e <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosing"> </xref> eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> event occurs when a designer finalizes a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed>evento si verifica quando una finestra di progettazione consente di finalizzare una transazione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified value that indicates whether the designer called <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs"> </xref> classe, utilizzando il valore che indica se la finestra di progettazione è stato chiamato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>sulla transazione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se è stato eseguito il commit della transazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If `commit` is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventArgs.LastTransaction%2A> property defaults to `true`.
A value indicating whether the transaction was committed.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se è stato eseguito il commit della transazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se si tratta dell'ultima transazione per chiudere; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this is the last transaction to close.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo è l'ultima transazione da chiudere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if this is the last transaction to close; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se si tratta dell'ultima transazione per chiudere; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer called <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la finestra di progettazione chiamato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>sulla transazione.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer called <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on the transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la finestra di progettazione chiamato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>sulla transazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>
